dataset.summary: Team Keck Treasury Redshift Survey Catalog
dataset.remarks: The catalog includes redshifts and associated quality assessments, photometric and astrometric measurements for all targets detected in the GOODS-North region.

column.name: [cx]
column.summary: Cartesian X (J2000)

column.name: [cy]
column.summary: Cartesian Y (J2000)

column.name: [cz]
column.summary: Cartesian Z (J2000)

column.name: [htmid]
column.summary: HTM ID (J2000)

column.name: [zoneid]
column.summary: Zone ID

column.name: [TKRS]
column.summary: Serial number in Team Keck Survey

column.name: [RA]
column.summary: DEIMOS degree of Right Ascension (J2000)

column.name: [DEC]
column.summary: DEIMOS Degree of Declination (J2000)

column.name: [Rmag]
column.summary: DEIMOS R band (648.7±81nm) in AB system

column.name: [Mask]
column.summary: Mask number on which object was placed

column.name: [Slit]
column.summary: Slit number for object on TKRS mask

column.name: [z]
column.summary: Topocentric redshift measured by TKRS

column.name: [q_z]
column.summary: Redshift code assigned by TKRS. Redshift code as follows: -1= star 1= redshift unmeasurable 2= redshift uncertain 3= 90% confidence 4= 99% confidence

column.name: [zOther]
column.summary: Alternate redshift from other works

column.name: [r_zOther]
column.summary: Source of alternate redshift

column.name: [XpixD]
column.summary: X position on the DEIMOS mosaic image

column.name: [YpixD]
column.summary: Y position on the DEIMOS mosaic image

column.name: [ACS]
column.summary: Sector number in which the object lies on the HST/ACS mosaic image. As shown in the figure made by the GOODS team at

column.name: [XpixG]
column.summary: X position on the HST/ACS mosaic image

column.name: [YpixG]
column.summary: Y position on the HST/ACS mosaic image

column.name: [MajAxis]
column.summary: DEIMOS semi-major axis. Measured by SExtractor on DEIMOS mosaic image.

column.name: [e2]
column.summary: DEIMOS ellipticity (1-a/b). Measured by SExtractor on DEIMOS mosaic image.

column.name: [PA]
column.summary: [-90/140] DEIMOS major axis position angle. Measured by SExtractor on DEIMOS mosaic image (North=0, East=+90).

column.name: [GOODS]
column.summary: GOODS-N v1.0 catalog IAU identification. Of objects matching the DEIMOS catalogue from Giavalisco et al. (2004, in Cat. II/261).
